item.title: Command help 317 [delta]
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

ok well im trying to have good commands but mine dont work so if u can post the 1’s i need here that wud be nice.
i need
a working ::checkinv command
a working ::onlinestaff command
a working ::help commmand that send a message to staff that some1 need help
this is my help command that needs to be fixed, it sends the message to all
not just staff

public String reportTo[] = {“Cj”, “Xmonster”, “Rodger”, “Kade9988”, “Steve”, “Prophet”, “Iambuzn”, “Skillz”};

public void processReport(String msg) {
for (Player element : handler.players) {
client p = (client) element;
if ((p != null) && !p.disconnected && (p.absX > 0)) {
if(doSend§) {
p.sM(msg +“©auto©”);
}
}
}
}

public boolean doSend(client player) {
for(int names = 0; names < reportTo.length; names++) {
if(player.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(reportTo[names])) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}
